summary: The diff implements a tokenless “claim store ownership” backend method with a corresponding frontend /admin CTA and React Query hooks/keys for claimability + post-claim invalidation. A migration file was added to preserve state across upgrades. No clear unimplemented BuildRequest requirements are evident from the provided diff summary, but a couple of unrelated UI tweaks appear to have been included.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested fix/change: corrected SafeProductUploadAction prop name ("onFileSelected") mentioned as part of the AdminDashboardPage update.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on admin auto-assign/claim flow, diagnostics, and React Query invalidation. This prop-name correction is not part of REQ-55 to REQ-59.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested enhancement: AccessDeniedScreen supports an optional custom message prop to display specific authorization failure explanations.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-58 only requires that, when not claimable, the user continues to see existing Access Denied behavior; it does not request new AccessDeniedScreen customization capabilities.
